entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:18 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

Temperature: -2.9°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -4.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
